entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 18. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. High 19. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 8 May 2023
